name: Escape From The Castle of Sad Ghosts
name_original: Escape From The Castle of Sad Ghosts
description:
Sad ghosts have confused 'kidnapping' with 'making friends'. Try to escape without being seen or you'll hurt their feelings! They mean well, but they're dead and mixed-up.

Ghosts don't have great eyesight, but they can sense things in a 360 degree circle through solid objects. Stay out of their radius! 

Press S to sneak past them (but if they touch you it'll still hurt). 

Press H to use ninja energy to blend into the shadows for a few seconds (you won't get hurt if ghosts touch you). Hold R to recharge ninja energy.

W/A/S/D = movement! 

F - use sword!
